name: Nature's Selection: Bohemian Buffet
description:
This is our submission for Sabotage Game Jam 2022!

Play as a mutated mixture of animal pieces as you hunt and survive the deep sea. Become natural selection itself as you ravage the weaklings of the ocean floor. Those who are large enough to thrives may have the same power over you. Feed off of specific exotic sea creatures to amplify your score and increase in size to become a biological black hole.

Eat smaller creatures, void larger creatures and accumulate as many points as possible.

Controls:

Hold Left Click: Move (Always moves towards the mouse)

Right Click: Dash

Credits:

Yussef Shehadeh - Programmer

Jason Durand - Programmer & Champion

Wanda Valentina Venegas Amaya - Creature Artist and Animations

Timothe Lafond - Game Design, Level & 2D Artist

Assets:

Ninety Nine Works, Pixel Games, Comeback, The Little Game Factory, TinForge, Mr Andrew Chapman, day9, Aligned Games, Moonflower Carnivore

Sounds:

Glaneur de sons, theplax, zteen, Halleck, Mrthenoronha, wadaltmon, benzix2, Merrick079

People that sabotaged us to get their name here:

https://nemeon.itch.io/, https://dante09.itch.io/, https://anonymehatano.itch.io/
